hackathon-description-text: DreamHackathon: VR is the second instalment in the new DreamHackathon series. This time we are at the center of gaming, DreamHack Winter 2014 - the world’s largest digital festival. Participate in teams armed with the latest tech and the greatest skills to produce the best results within the 24 hour timeframe. We are inviting the giants from the hardware and software industry, united under the banner Virtual Reality. Be there.
hackathon-eligibility: You must be at least 18 years old.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Grand first price will grant you the ability to aim for the stars; get your own game studio going - if you wish!
Award winning headset Nash 20 by Mionix with a value of 5500 SEK

hackathon-description-header: 120 participants, 24 hours and a jury representing the gaming industry. First prize in the DreamHackathon is 50 000 SEK. DreamHackathon: VR is the first themed game jam in this series!
